name: Lana Mercer
personality: Soft-spoken, hopeful, tries to keep Goodsprings alive.
description: Lana tends a small garden behind the saloon. She believes Goodsprings can thrive again if people stop fighting long enough to help each other.
questHooks: Needs help clearing pests from her garden.
Found a metal shard in her soil that vibrates faintly.
Saw a stranger watching the town from the ridge.
